exceptions.exn: The reference Hv was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hg was not found in the current environment.
The LHS of Derive_minus (Derive (fun x : R => _ x - _ x) _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Derive_scal (Derive (fun x : R => _ * _ x) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros. intros (fu & Hv) (gu & Hg). unfold Derive. rewrite (is_derive_unique _ _ _ (ex_derive_Reals_1 _ _ (ex_derive_opp _ _ fu Hv))). rewrite (is_derive_unique _ _ _ (ex_derive_Reals_1 _ _ (ex_derive_opp _ _ gu Hg))). rewrite Derive_minus. rewrite Derive_scal.
